short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your YouTube bookmarks into folders.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Youtube Bookmarks" chrome extension, which will essentially provide you all the features of bookmarking your favorite Youtube videos for watching them later, organizing, searching,  sharing them with friends & Social Media and many more.

Key features and flow:

1. Bookmark Creation:
   - A bookmark button is added to the YouTube video player.
   - When clicked, it captures the video title, URL, timestamp, and channel name.
   - Opens the popup for folder selection or creation.

2. Folder Management:
   - Users can create, view, and delete folders.
   - An "Add Folder" button is always visible at the bottom of the popup.

3. Bookmark Organization:
   - Bookmarks are stored in user-created folders.
   - Each bookmark displays video thumbnail, title, channel name, and timestamp.
   - Users can add notes to bookmarks.

4. Search Functionality:
   - Users can search bookmarks by title or channel name.

5. Sharing Options:
   - Each bookmark has a share button with options to copy link, share on social media, or via email.

6. User Interface:
   - Clean, modern design with custom fonts and icons.
   - Collapsible folder view for easy navigation.
   - Responsive layout that adapts to the popup size.

7. Data Storage:
   - Uses Chrome's storage API to save bookmarks and folders.
   - Your data remains on your machine.

The extension effectively integrates with YouTube, providing a seamless bookmarking experience while offering robust organization and sharing features.
